trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_00<tab>Falkbryda would like to have a word with you.

TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_01<tab>Falkbryda tells you that the Sahagin have caught wind of a shipment of crystals bound for Aleport. Seek out Ururu Kogururu at Aleport, and learn how you might assist in protecting the precious crystal cargo.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_02<tab>You have spoken with Ururu Kogururu, who bids you receive further instructions from a man named Dawson down by the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_03<tab>Dawson receives your arrival with suspicion, but he ultimately accepts your offer of aid. Pick up a box of supplies from the wharf.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_04<tab>You have collected a box of Maelstrom supplies. Take it down to the destination on the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_05<tab>You have placed the box of Maelstrom supplies on the pier. Pick up another box of supplies.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_06<tab>You have collected another box of Maelstrom supplies. Take it down to the destination on the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_07<tab>You have placed the box of Maelstrom supplies on the pier. Pick up the last box of supplies.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_08<tab>You have collected the last box of Maelstrom supplies. Take it down to the destination on the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_09<tab>All the supply boxes are now where they should be. Report your success to Dawson.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_10<tab>Thanking you for your labor, Dawson bids you return to Ururu Kogururu and inform him that your work on the pier is done.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_SEQ_11<tab>The ship will need to be loaded immediately upon arrival. If you need make any preparations, the time is now.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Ururu Kogururu at Aleport.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Dawson.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_02<tab>Obtain a supply box.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_03<tab>Take the supply box to the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_04<tab>Obtain a supply box.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_05<tab>Take the supply box to the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_06<tab>Obtain a supply box.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_07<tab>Take the supply box to the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_08<tab>Speak with Dawson.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_TODO_09<tab>Report to Ururu Kogururu.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_FALKBRYDA_000_000<tab>I won't waste your time with niceties. As we speak, a ship is bound for Aleport, where it will reprovision.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_FALKBRYDA_000_001<tab>The ship carries precious freight─crystals from the Isles of Umbra─which it is set to consign to Maelstrom couriers.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_FALKBRYDA_000_002<tab>Yet loose lips have let the fishbacks gain wind of the plan.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_FALKBRYDA_000_003<tab>Were these crystals to fall into Sahagin hands, it would bring them that much closer to reawakening Leviathan─a contingency we can ill abide.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_FALKBRYDA_000_004<tab>I ask that you see to the safety of the crystals. My subordinate, Ururu Kogururu, awaits you at Aleport.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_URURUKOGURURU_000_010<tab>Ah, I take it you're the Scion they spoke of? I'd imagined someone more imposing. Nevertheless, the ship won't be in for some while.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_URURUKOGURURU_000_011<tab>We'll need to load the ship as soon as she arrives, so as to lend no license to Sahagin interlopers. You'll do the most help at the pier.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DAWSON_000_020<tab>And just who in Eorzea are you supposed to be!? They hired an adventurer? No one told me about an adventurer!

TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DAWSON_000_021<tab>Well, I suppose you might as well make yourself useful. Bring the supplies from the wharf to the pier so the ship can reprovision as soon as she docks. That should help.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DUMMY_000_030<tab>Carry supplies
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DUMMY_000_031<tab>Carry supplies
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DUMMY_000_032<tab>Carry supplies

TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DAWSON_000_040<tab>Well, well, you're a quick worker. I forgot my name...er, I forgot to tell you my name. The name's...Dawson. I oversee every crate that washes up and ships out of here.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DAWSON_000_041<tab>Go back and let your Maelstrom masters know that this load is in shipshape! No more for you to do here, no sir!
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_URURUKOGURURU_000_050<tab>Excellent. You've done all you can for now, just make sure you're prepared when it comes time for the ship to leave port.
TEXT_GAIUSC802_01026_DAWSON_000_060<tab>We'll want that ship in and out as quick as can be so we can stay one step ahead of any Sahagin raiders.
